All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ANSI
ANSI escape codes for text and background colors.
Callback
The Callback class represents a server-side callback handler that interacts with a remote client.
Card
Represents a card (objective ones not included)
CardAdapter
 
CardPlacement
Represents the placement of a card on the player's field.
CardPlacementTest
Unit tests for verifying the functionality of the CardPlacement class.
CardTest
Unit tests for verifying the functionality of different types of cards: StarterCard, GoldCardInt, and ResourceCard.
Chat
Represents the chat functionality for communication between players.
Chat
Controller class for managing chat functionality in the GUI.
ChatError
Error message indicating an error in chat functionality.
ChatException
Exception thrown to indicate an error occurred in the chat system.
ChatMessage
Represents a chat message in the game.
ChatMessage.ChatType
Represents the type of chat message, either public or private.
ChatWindow
The ChatWindow class represents a chat interface with functionalities to display and manage chat messages.
ChooseObjective
A class representing a message for the "choose objective" game action.
ChooseObjectivePopup
Controller class for managing the "Choose Objective" popup window in the GUI.
ChooseStarter
A class representing a message for the "choose starter" game action.
ChooseStarterPopup
Controller class for managing the "Choose Starter Card" popup window in the GUI.
Cli
Represents the CLI (Command Line Interface) It prints the game onto the terminal and enables the player to play the game through various terminal commands
Client
Client class for connecting to the game server.
ClientRemote
The ClientRemote interface represents the remote interface for a client in a distributed system.
Connection
The Connection interface represents a connection to a server in a networked environment.
Connection
The Connection interface represents a connection handler on the server side.
ConnectionPlaceholder
A placeholder implementation of the Connection interface used for testing.
Controller
Controller class manages the game logic and interactions between players and the game model.
ControllerTest
Unit tests for the Controller class.
Corner
Represents the corner of a card
CornerNotPresentException
Exception thrown when expecting a corner when it's not present.
CornerPosition
Represents the position of a corner on a card.
CornerTest
Unit test class for the Corner class.
CreateLobby
Controller class for managing the "Create Lobby" view in the GUI.
CreateLobbyMessage
Represents a message to create a new lobby with a specified number of players.
CreateMatchError
Error message indicating an error in creating a match.
Deck
Represents a deck of playable cards in the game.
DeckTest
JUnit test class for testing the functionalities of the Deck class.
DispositionObjective
Represents an objective related to the disposition of cards on the player's field.
DispositionObjectiveTest
 
Draw
Responsible for generating graphical representations for various objects of the game, such as cards, objectives and card placements
DrawError
Error message indicating an error in drawing a card.
DrawGold
A class representing a message for the "draw gold" game action.
DrawMarket
A class representing a message for the "draw market" game action.
DrawResource
A class representing a message for the "draw resource" game action.
DrawTest
Tests the generation of text representations for various DispositionObjective instances.
ErrorMessage
The ErrorMessage class serves as an abstract base class for all error messages within the system.
FailedGameReconnectionMessage
This class represents a message indicating a failed attempt to reconnect to a game.
FailedToStartMatchMessage
This class represents a message indicating a failed attempt to start the match.
FieldController
Controller that manages the players' fields in the GUI Handles placement of cards and resizing of the pane
FieldWindow
The FieldWindow class represents a window that displays a player's field, including card placements and symbol counts.
FieldWindowTest
 
GameAction
Enum representing different game actions that can be performed.
GameMessage
An abstract class representing a game-related message.
GameReconnectionMessage
This class represents a message indicating a successful reconnection to a game.
GameState
Represents the state of the game for the client side.
GameStateMessage
Record representing a message containing the current state of the game.
GetLobbiesMessage
Represents a message to request a list of available lobbies.
GetLobbiesResponseMessage
Represents a message containing a response with a list of available lobbies.
GetLobbyInfoMessage
Represents a message to request information about a specific lobby.
GoldCard
Represents a gold card that can be played under certain conditions.
GoldCardAdapter
 
GoldCardCorner
Represents a gold card that awards points based on the number of corners it occupies on the field.
GoldCardCornerTest
JUnit test class for testing the functionalities of GoldCardCorner.
GoldCardInt
Represents a gold card that is worth a specified number of points.
GoldCardIntTest
JUnit test class for testing the functionalities of GoldCardInt.
GoldCardObject
The GoldCardObject class represents a specific type of gold card in the game.
GoldCardObjectTest
JUnit test class for testing the functionalities of GoldCardObject.
GoldCardTest
 
GoldDeck
Represents a deck of Gold cards.
GoldDeckTest
 
GsonSingleton
Utility class for creating a Gson instance configured with custom adapters for serializing and deserializing PlayableCard and Objective objects.
GsonSingletonTest
 
Gui
Gui class represents the main GUI application for the game Codex Naturalis.
GuiHandler
This class handles incoming messages from the server and updates the GUI accordingly.
ImagePath
Utility class for generating Image objects based on specified paths.
InvalidMessage
Error message indicating that a received message is invalid.
InvalidSymbolException
Exception thrown when an invalid symbol is specified.
JoinLobbyMessage
Represents a message to join a specific lobby identified by its ID.
JoinMatchError
Error message indicating an error in joining a match.
JsonLoadException
Exception thrown when an error occurs during the JSON data loading process.
LeaveLobbyMessage
Represents a message to leave the current lobby.
LeaveMatchError
Error message indicating an error occurred while leaving a match.
Lobby
Represents the lobby where players join before starting a match.
Lobby
Controller class for managing the lobby view in the GUI.
LobbyInfo
A class representing information about a lobby.
LobbyInfoMessage
Represents a message containing information about players in a lobby.
Login
Controller class for managing the login view in the GUI.
LoginError
Error message indicating a login error.
LoginMessage
Represents a login message containing the username of the player.
Match
Represents a match in the game.
MatchDoesNotExistError
Error message indicating that a match does not exist for the requested action.
MatchExceptions
Custom exception class for match-related errors in the game.
MatchExceptions.ErrorCode
Enumeration of error codes for match exceptions.
MatchTest
 
Menu
Controller class for managing the main menu view in the GUI.
Message
Represents a message in the game.
MessageType
Represents the different types of messages that can be exchanged in the game.
NetworkExceptions
Custom exception class for network-related errors in the game.
NetworkExceptions.ErrorCode
Enumeration of error codes for network exceptions.
NoCoveredCornerException
Exception thrown when expecting a covered corner when none was present.
NotifyCardPlayed
This class represents a notification message that is sent when a card is played.
NotifyCardState
This class represents a notification message that is sent to update the state of the cards in the game.
NotifyChosenObjective
This class represents a notification message that is sent when an objective is chosen.
NotifyChosenStarter
This class represents a notification message that is sent when a starter card is chosen.
NotifyColorsAssignment
This class represents a notification message that is sent to assign colors to players.
NotifyDraw
This class represents a notification message that is sent when a player draws a card.
NotifyDraw.DrawType
Enum representing the types of draws.
NotifyEndMatch
This class represents a notification message that is sent at the end of a match.
NotifyGlobalObjectives
This class represents a notification message that is sent to update the global objectives.
NotifyLastRound
This class represents a notification message that is sent to indicate the last round of the game.
NotifyMatchStarted
This class represents a notification message that is sent when a match has started.
NotifyMessage
Abstract class representing a notification message.
NotifyPlayerHand
This class represents a notification message that is sent to update a player's hand and back hands.
NotifySetUpFinished
This class represents a notification message that is sent when the game setup has finished.
NotifyStarterCards
This class represents a notification message that is sent to inform players about the starter cards chosen by each player.
NotifyToChooseObjective
This class represents a notification message that is sent to prompt a player to choose between two objectives.
NotifyToChooseStarter
This class represents a notification message that is sent to prompt a player to choose a starter card.
NotifyTurn
This class represents a notification message that is sent to inform a player about their turn.
NotifyType
Enum defining different types of notification messages.
Objective
Abstract class representing an objective in the game.
ObjectiveAdapter
Gson adapter for serializing and deserializing Objective objects to and from JSON.
ObjectiveChooseError
Error message indicating an error occurred during objective selection.
PlayableCard
Represents any card that can be played by a player in his field
PlayableCardAdapter
Gson adapter for serializing and deserializing PlayableCard objects to and from JSON.
PlayableCardTest
JUnit test class for testing the functionalities of PlayableCard.
PlayCard
Represents a message to play a card in the game.
PlayCardError
Error message indicating an error occurred while playing a card.
PlayCardPopup
Controller class for managing the popup window to play a card in the GUI.
Player
Represents a player in the game.
PlayerColor
Enumeration representing colors that can be associated with players.
PlayerExceptions
Custom exception class for player-related errors in the game.
PlayerExceptions.ErrorCode
Enumeration of error codes for player exceptions.
PlayerField
Represents the field of a player where cards can be placed.
PlayerFieldTest
 
PlayerInitialConfig
Represents the initial configuration of a player in the game, including their starter card, objectives, and choices made during setup.
PlayerJoinedLobbyMessage
Represents a message indicating that a player has joined a lobby.
PlayerLeftLobbyMessage
Represents a message indicating that a player has left a lobby.
PlayerTest
 
Position
Represents a position on the player's field.
PositionTest
 
QueueWindow
The QueueWindow class represents a queue-like text window for displaying messages, with functionalities to add, clear, and retrieve messages.
ResourceCard
Represents a resource card that can be played by a player in their field.
ResourceCardTest
JUnit test class for testing the functionalities of ResourceCard.
ResourceDeck
Represents a deck of resource cards.
ResourceDeckTest
 
SceneController
Abstract controller class for managing scenes in the GUI.
Scores
Controller class for managing the scores display in the GUI.
ScoreTrack
Represents the score track for a game.
ScoreTrackTest
 
Server
The server class manages game connections and lobbies, handling client interactions via both socket and RMI protocols.
ServerGameState
Represents the server-side state of the game, including player information, card placements, objectives, decks, market state, and current game progress.
ServerMessageHandler
The ServerMessageHandler class handles incoming messages from clients and processes them accordingly based on their type and the client's state.
ServerRemote
The ServerRemote interface defines remote methods that a server can expose to clients for communication in a distributed system.
Skeleton
The Skeleton class represents a client-side implementation of both ClientRemote and Connection interfaces for interacting with a remote server.
SocketConnection
The SocketConnection class represents a client-side socket-based connection handler that communicates with a server.
SocketConnection
The SocketConnection class represents a server-side socket-based connection handler that manages communication with a client.
StarterCard
Represents a starter card that can be played by a player in their field.
StarterCardTest
JUnit test class for testing the functionalities of StarterCard.
StarterChooseError
Error message indicating an error occurred during starter card selection.
Stub
The Stub class implements the ServerRemote interface for handling RMI communication with clients.
SuccessLobby
Represents a success message related to a lobby in the game.
SuccessMessage
Represents a success message in the game.
Symbol
Represents various types of symbols, including both kingdom types and object types.
SymbolObjective
Represents an objective based on symbol occurrences.
SymbolObjectiveTest
 
SymbolPool
Represents a pool of symbols available on the player's field.
SymbolPoolTest
 
Table
Controller class representing the game table in the GUI.
UnauthorizedError
Error message indicating an unauthorized action due to lack of login.
UnknownMessageType
Exception thrown to indicate that an unknown message type was encountered.
View
The View class serves as an abstract base for handling the connection between the client and the server.
